Good evening

We hope you are well. 

Weâre very excited to announce that we will soon be launching our breakfast menu and would love to invite you along as one of the first people to try it this Saturday, 16th April. 

We have availability at 10am or 10:30am for you and a guest to come along and sample our new offering. Youâll both be able to pick a dish from the main menu, enjoy a tea/coffee/drink (non-alcoholicâ¦) and a sweet treat from our new cake selection.

Please let us know if you would like to attend and what time is most suitable for you. 

Warmest wishes
Namaste

Hi Gus, sorry for the late reply and we are so very sorry that we had to ask you to reschedule on Saturday. 

We were disappointed by some of the feedback from our guests on Friday and did not want to further disappoint anyone on Saturday. We hope to welcome you Namaste very soon and we canât wait for you to enjoy our authentic taste of India. ð®ð³ð¥ðð»
Ok not a problem, can i get back to u if thats ok? These things happen

Weâre also currently running on a cash-only basis â the till system went down yesterday before the first launch night (nightmare) and wonât be fixed until Monday now.

Hey Gus ðð»

Weâre so sorry to have to send this message but weâre going to have to reschedule our planned launch events for this weekend!

Hey Gus
 
Thanks for getting back to me!  I can get you a table for 4 at 7.30pm on Saturday 11th September.  ð Namaste is part of the exciting new redevelopment of the St Enoch Centre, located next to the brand-new Vue cinema.   Food is complimentary and youâll receive a welcome drink on arrival.  
 
We're planning on posting out exclusive invite tickets in the coming weeks, so if you can send over an address and full name for us to post them out to that would be great!

Hi, im a regular in the delhi darbar and stay in Bishopbriggs and would love to come along to your new venture in glasgow. Very exciting ð the 11th September would be ideal and what time? Could i bring 3 others as well please?

Many thanks
Gus

Hi Gus

Iâm writing to you to extend an invite to our brand new restaurant launch in Glasgow City Centre, happening next month. 

Namaste is a brand new look at Indian cuisine; we hope to reinvent the traditional dining experience, via fresh, family recipes and the finest locally sourced ingredients. Launching in September, weâve been a favourite in Bishopbriggs for the last three decades; bringing our warm welcome, amazing level of service & great taste to the heart of Glasgow. With modern twists on classic Indian dishes, brand new menu items & exciting new desserts weâre excited to showcase our new jewel in the crown! 

Weâd love you to join us at one of our exclusive pre-launch events on 10th-11th September to be the first to try out our new dishes, desserts & drinks menu. Dinner is on us! 

Look forward to hearing from you, and welcoming you to Namaste by Delhi Darbar.

Thanks!
